name: SlasherRPG
description:
Slasher RPG

Fantasy Openworld style game, grow vegetables, crafting building and action adventures in a wide world.
Content mix : farming, pet breeding, dungeon exploration, crafting and combat. and the possibilities are endless. Along with stories and interesting things that are waiting for you to explore.

Gathering

You can collect crops and build the garden of your dreams. And bring various raw materials to build.. Bring valuable products Let's get rich

Pet

Catch many kinds of animals in the game, raise and grow with these cute pets. There are many pets waiting for you to discover them.

Dungeon

The dungeon has many treasures and high-level materials and powerful monsters that are ready to kill you at any time. Please avoid them if you are not strong enough, many monsters are waiting for you

Vehicle

Find various mounts or vehicles and ride on adventures in the big world. There are many mounts or vehicles waiting for you to go on an adventure together!
